headline: Democratic lawmakers blocked the Texas House from meeting Monday, preventing Republicans from moving ahead with a new congressional map requested by President Trump
Former Vice President Kamala Harris said Wednesday she wouldn’t run for governor of California next year, leaving open the possibility of another presidential bid in 2028
The cost of the border wall has ballooned since President Trump’s first term when he said it would cost $8 billion and Mexico would pay for it. Congress recently allocated $46 billion for it
India, Russia hit back after U.S. accuses Modi government of fuelling Russia's war in Ukraine
Viable trade deal wasn't on the table ahead of deadline, Canada-U.S. trade minister says
Israeli plan to occupy Gaza brings fear to Palestinians, hostage families
India says additional U.S. tariffs over Russian oil purchases are ‘unjustified and unreasonable.’
Brazil’s Supreme Court Orders Ex-President Bolsonaro Under House Arrest for Defying Court Order
A chief White House economic adviser said that Trump wants allies placed in the Bureau of Labor Statistics after the agency published a dismal jobs report and the president fired its commissioner
The State Department may require travelers entering the U.S. from certain countries to post a bond of up to $15,000, a move aimed at deterring foreigners from overstaying their visas
